Package mx.org.pescadormvp.core.client.regionsandcontainers

Classes related to UI regions and container widgets for layout.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DynamicContainer
    A special container that can be told to de-activate or have a minimum height or width, can pass those messages on (probable to a larger layout widget it's a part of), and can be associated with absolutely positioned widgets not visually contained within it.
    DynamicContainer.ContainerDeactivation  
    ForRegionTag
    A superinterface for tag interfaces that refer to UI regions.
    HasAbsolutelyPositionedWidgets
    Interface for widgets (say, views) that have absolutely positioned widgets associated with them but not necessarily contained in them visually.
    HasFixedSetOfRegions
    A class that not only HasRegions, but that has a fixed set of them, and can tell you about them.
    HasRegions
    A class that has regions designated by a subinterface of ForRegionTag and can provide DynamicContainers for them.
    IsRegion
    An entity that, for example a DynamicContainer, is a UI region and provide the tag interface that designates that region.
    RegionManager
    A class that manages UI regions designated via ForRegionTags and implemented with a HasRegions widget.
    RegionStateUpdateRequiredEvent.Handler  
    RegionStyler
    A class used for complex styling of regions.
    RootHasFixedSetOfRegions
    A HasFixedSetOfRegions that has a method for attaching itself to the RootLayoutPanel.
    RootRegionManager
    A class that manages UI regions designated via ForRegionTags and implemented with a RootHasFixedSetOfRegions widget.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DynamicSimpleLayoutPanel
    An implementation of DynamicContainer.
    LayoutHelper
    Helper class for standard layout/region/container actions normally used in classes that manage global app layout.
    NullPanelTools
    Some tools for deactivating UI regions.
    NullPanelTools.NullActivity
    Stub activity that simply deactivates its corresponding window area
    NullPanelTools.NullComponent
    Placeholder.
    NullPanelTools.NullView
    Stub view to be used with null activities (when a region of the screen has no activity and is hidden).
    RegionStateUpdateRequiredEvent
    Indicates that the state of a UI region needs updating.

Package mx.org.pescadormvp.core.client.regionsandcontainers Description
